  • Monitoring local save procedures
  • View page source

Monitoring local save proceduresÂ¶

By selecting the Monitor local saves of system documents, the link is instructed to call attention to potential changes when saving or closing Office documents opened in the system for editing and, at the same time, give you the option to save them in the system directly.
